data.news_body: Announcement under Reg 30 - Reply to clarification sought from Sudarshan Colorants India Limited

data.caption: Clarification sought from Sudarshan Colorants India Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Sudarshan Colorants India Ltd on January 23 2026 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Postponement Of The Board Meeting Proposed To Be Held Today I.E. May 30 2025 For Approving The Audited Financial Results In Terms Of Regulation 33 Of SEBI Listing Regulations 2015
data.news_body: This has reference to the intimation dated May 27 2025 whereby we had informed about convening the meeting of the Board of Directors on May 30 2025 for interalia considering and adopting the audited financial results for the quarter and financial year ended March 31 2025. In this regards we would like to state that the preparation of results and its audit thereof is still continuing and hence the Board meeting for approving the financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025 stands postponed till further notice.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Delay In Submission Of Audited Financial Results In Terms Of Regulation 33 Of SEBI Listing Regulations 2015
data.news_body: This has reference to the intimation dated May 27 2025 whereby we had informed the stock exchange about convening the meeting of the Board of Directors on May 30 2025 interalia for considering and adopting the audited financial results of the company for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025. We would like to state that the preparation of the accounts and audit thereof  is still continuing and hence the Board did not transact the item relating to "Adoption of financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025".

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The 3Rd Quarter And Nine Months Ended           December 31, 2021 Along With The Limited Review Report Thereon
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company had at their meeting held on February 10, 2022, inter alia, approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results for the 3rd Quarter and Nine months ended December 31, 2021.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosing herewith the Unaudited Financial Results and Limited Review Report for the 3rd Quarter and Nine months ended December 31, 2021 with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting - February 10, 2022
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company have at their meeting held on February 10, 2022, inter alia, approved the following:

1. Un-Audited Financial Results for the 3rd Quarter and Nine months ended December 31, 2021;
2. Appointment of J R Ahuja & Co., Company Secretaries, as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the Financial year ending on March 31, 2022. Brief profile of Mr. Jagdish Ahuja is as attached:

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting - November 11, 2021
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company have at their meeting held on November 11, 2021, inter alia, approved and taken on record the following:

1. Unaudited Financial Results and Limited Review Report for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 along with the Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement as on September 30, 2021;
2. Mr. Adnan Ahmad has informed today to the Nomination & Remuneration Committee ('the Committee') and the Board that he will retire on December 31, 2021. Consequently, he has served his resignation from the position of Vice-Chairman & Managing Director of the Company effective from January 1, 2022. The same has been noted and taken on record by the Committee and the Board;
3. Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit the following details of change in Directorate of the Company due to resignation:

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021 Along With The Limited Review Report Thereon
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company had at their meeting held on November 11, 2021, inter alia, approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosing herewith the Unaudited Financial Results and Limited Review Report for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 along with the Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement as on September 30, 2021.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The 1St Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to our letter dated August 12, 2021, vide which the Un-Audited Financial Results and Limited Review Report for the 1st Quarter ended June 30, 2021 were disclosed, we would like to submit and clarify few technical observations as below:

1. While combining and collating the covering letter, Limited Review Report and the Financial Results, digitally, the Digital Signature Certificate (DSC) of signing partner of MSKA & Associates, Statutory Auditors, was removed;
2. The DSC was automatically removed by the system itself, due to security reasons;
3. In order to ensure timely compliance of statutory provisions in true letter and spirit, we have disseminated to the Stock Exchanges the said file only.

In this regard, we hereby re-submit the same file, having DSC of Mr. Vishal Vilas Divadkar, signing partner for your records purpose.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The 1St Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company had at their meeting held on August 12, 2021, inter alia, approved and taken on record the Un-Audited Financial Results for the 1st Quarter ended June 30, 2021.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosing herewith the Un-Audited Financial Results and Limited Review Report for the 1st Quarter ended June 30, 2021.

The Board meeting commenced at 12:15 p.m. and concluded at 3:00 p.m.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions - October To March 2021
data.news_body: ¬Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the disclosures of related party transactions for the half year ended on March 31, 2021.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021 Along With Auditor'S Report Thereon
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosing herewith the following;

1) Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 along with Statement of Abstract of Balance Sheet and Cash Flow Statement;
2) Auditor's Report for the year ended March 31, 2021;

Further, we hereby declare that the Report of the Auditors is with unmodified opinion with respect to the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The 3Rd Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2020 Along With The Limited Review Report Thereon
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company had at their meeting held on February 12, 2021, inter alia, approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results for the 3rd Quarter and Nine months ended December 31, 2020.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosing herewith the Unaudited Financial Results and Limited Review Report for the 3rd Quarter and Nine months ended December 31, 2020.
